companyDescription: SAPT Markets is your complete supermarket with a wide range of products at affordable prices. We make grocery shopping more convenient than ever.
orderReceivedNotification: Your order #{orderInvoice} has been received. Your verification code is {verificationCode}. Please provide this code to our delivery personnel to receive your package.
earnPointsWithEveryPurchaseAndRedeem: Earn points with every purchase and redeem them for amazing discounts
loyaltyIntroduction: Our loyalty program is designed to reward you for every purchase. Earn points on every order and redeem them for exclusive discounts on your future shopping.
earningPointsExplanation: You earn loyalty points for every Saudi Riyal you spend on our platform. The more you shop, the more points you accumulate!
redeemingPointsExplanation: Redeem your accumulated points for discounts on your purchases at checkout. Each point has a specific value that contributes to your savings.
pointExpirationExplanation: Points have an expiration period. Make sure to use your points before they expire to maximize your benefits.
checkYourBalance: Check your balance, earn history, and redemption options right here in your loyalty dashboard.
profileMainPageEdit: Edit your profile information and manage your address details.
